Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades

Class XadesSignatureToBeSigned

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades.XadesContentToBeSigned
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades.XadesSignatureToBeSigned
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentToBeSigned
public class XadesSignatureToBeSigned extends XadesContentToBeSigned
Esta classe representa uma assinatura que será assinada. Seu modo será sempre COUNTERSIGNED. Estende XadesContentToBeSigned
